name: Untitled Bullet Hell demo
description:
Welcome to the insanely-difficult arcade bullet hell!

Take control and gun through Hell spawn whilst dodging their insanely powerful bullet patterns. Learn to master each Bosses unique attacks and decimate them so that you face Satan himself!
With help from your trusty Dash ability and multiple power-ups - the near impossible difficulty wont be enough to stop you from defeating Satan and beating the Untitled Bullet Hell Game!

Key Features

  • 5 tough as nails Boss-Fights that will give even the most elite of gamers a good run for their money!
  • Multiple power-ups that can increase stats such as speed or stop time and unleash a devastating explosion upon your enemies!
  • 3 difficulty modes that can either make the bosses alot more endurable or even more of a challenge to defeat!
